hero.title: Your vision, our creation.
hero.subtitle: Bring your brand to life. From engaging content to stunning websites, we build your digital presence.
hero.description: At BYTE STUDIO, we create powerful visual content that helps brands connect, engage, and grow. From stunning photography to dynamic video production, we bring your story to life with visuals that leave a lasting impression. Our focus is on highlighting what makes each brand unique. Whether you need content for your website, social media, or marketing campaigns, we deliver creative, high-quality solutions designed to capture attention and inspire trust. More than just content creators, we're your creative partners — committed to helping your brand stand out in today's digital world.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At BYTE STUDIO, we create powerful visual content that helps brands connect, engage, and grow. From stunning photography to dynamic video production, we bring your story to life with visuals that leave a lasting impression. Our focus is on highlighting what makes each brand unique. Whether you need content for your website, social media, or marketing campaigns, we deliver creative, high-quality solutions designed to capture attention and inspire trust. More than just content creators, we're your creative partners — committed to helping your brand stand out in today's digital world.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover our comprehensive range of creative services designed to elevate your brand and captivate your audience.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: Professional food and beverage photography that captures the essence of your brand. From product shots to lifestyle imagery, we create stunning visuals that make your offerings irresistible.

videography.title: Video Production
videography.description: Dynamic video content that brings your brand to life. From promotional videos to social media content, we create engaging stories that connect with your audience and drive results.

webDevelopment.title: Website Development
webDevelopment.description: Modern, responsive websites that showcase your brand perfectly. We build fast, beautiful, and user-friendly sites that convert visitors into customers.

branding.title: Brand Storytelling
branding.description: Complete brand identity and storytelling solutions. We help you define your unique voice and create cohesive visual narratives that resonate with your target audience.

hero.title: Web Development
hero.subtitle: Modern, scalable, and beautiful websites that drive results
hero.description: We create cutting-edge web solutions using the latest technologies. From responsive design to complex applications, we build digital experiences that engage users and grow your business.

technologies.title: Modern Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Built with the latest tools and frameworks

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: React, Next.js, Vue.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

components.title: Modern Components
components.subtitle: Interactive UI elements that enhance user experience
components.description: We create custom components with smooth animations, responsive design, and intuitive interactions that make your website stand out.

animations.title: Interactive Animations
animations.subtitle: Engaging micro-interactions and smooth transitions
animations.description: From subtle hover effects to complex page transitions, we bring your website to life with carefully crafted animations that guide users and create memorable experiences.

parallax.title: Parallax Layers
parallax.description: Multiple layers moving at different speeds for depth

neumorphism.title: Neumorphism
neumorphism.description: Soft, elevated elements with depth and relief

revealAnimations.title: Reveal Animations
revealAnimations.description: Elements that appear with unique effects

gravityEffects.title: Gravity Effects
gravityEffects.description: Elements that fall and bounce with physics

architecture.title: Scalable Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Built for performance and growth
architecture.description: We design robust, scalable architectures that can handle growth while maintaining fast load times and optimal performance across all devices.

database.title: Data Management
database.subtitle: Efficient data handling and storage solutions
database.description: From simple content management to complex data processing, we implement secure and efficient database solutions tailored to your specific needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services

questions.a1: We offer photography, videography, marketing strategy, and brand identity services.
questions.q2: How long does a project take?
questions.a2: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.
questions.q3: Do you work with small businesses?
questions.a3: Yes! We work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to established corporations.

photography.title: PHOTOGRAPHY
photography.subtitle: Capturing moments that tell your story

footer.description: We create powerful visual content that helps brands connect, engage, and grow. More than just content creators, we're your creative partners.
